ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Breath of Harmony?
ygData.msgSnippet: Managed to get a hoop for my alter-ego and it s a long drawn-out process.  I think the idea behind the race-class combo s are that it s non- light races.  In
ygData.messageBody:
Managed to get a hoop for my alter-ego and it's a long drawn-out
process. I think the idea behind the race-class combo's are that it's
non-"light" races. In other words, pretty much anyone except those
from Faydwer (gnomes being an exception coz they're so little and evil
naturally!). And to get the hoop you have to talk to a troll in the
Innothule swamp, so that's not easy in the first place!

But it's a very very nice earring, extremely rarely for sale and from
memory I think they go for about 6k on Mith Marr. And the actual one
I got only cost me about 200p in rubies :-) Yay!

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (48) "Flirting is a girl's best friend"
Kalara, Enchanter (36) "LOADING, PLEASE WAIT ...."
Tura, Dark Elf Necromancer (9) "Jobantik, you really smell!"

Mith Marr server

wrote:

>Uhm better check the stats on the I-Hoop:

>Slot: Ears

>Classes: CLR, ENC, MAG, NEC, RNG, ROG, SHD, SHM, WAR, WIZ
>Effect: Spirit Tap
>Charges: 6
>(Magic) (Lore)
>(INT +6) (WIS +6) (HP +6)
>
>Nice AC but bard's can't wear them =/ Kind of a wierd race-class combo on
>this item.
>
>Sylly
